A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: convoluted.  too many jump the shark/nuke the fridge moments.  the plot was paper thin. Luke's catchphrase is nonsensical.  Kylo's Charlie Rose gaff was completely gratuitous and like most of the twists and turns\, without any reason than to grab the audiences attention. I didn't love TFA but it was overall much better than this.  It doesn't hold a candle to R1.
